channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Jean-Michel Bruel

item.title: Formal Requirements
item.description: Collaboration initiated with the Innopolis University on the use of formal methods in Requirements Engineering

item.title: FUN Modeling
item.description: Placing the Final User Needs (FUN) at the center of the (modeling) concerns

item.title: MBSE & Early Validation
item.description: An integrated model-based early validation approach for Railway Systems

item.title: GEMOC Initiative
item.description: GEMOC is an open and international initiative that aims to coordinate and disseminate the research results regarding the support of the coordinated use of various modeling languages that will lead to the concept of the globalization of modeling languages.

item.title: Moise
item.description: MOdels and Information Sharing for System Engineering in Extended Entreprise
